name: Russian SUV Offroad 3D
description:
Be a professional Russian SUV driver in our offroad driving simulator!

Choose one of the powerful SUV trucks and start your driving adventures. Try to drive a Russian truck across offroad terrain and enjoy the offroad simulator atmosphere. Start offroad driving right now! Complete missions and earn money! Spend the money on Russian SUV upgrades and new trucks to continue your driving journey in our simulator.

Features of Russian SUV Offroad 3D:

- Challenging offroad missions
- Powerful Russian SUV trucks
- Easy SUV driving controls
- Mud physics simulator
- Open World mode
- SUV upgrades
- Rain effects
- 3D graphics
- Time-limit

You can drive real Russian SUV! Explore locations to complete all missions. Upgrade your truck to be in time. Meet not only SUVs, but also challenging terrain and the spirit of Russian land. Try and feel that Russian SUV are the best. You'll never get bored with our Russian SUV Offroad 3D!

Explore all locations, they are full obstacles. Play the offroad simulator yourself and enjoy. Do all tasks and be fast, others are waiting for your truck. It is not so easy to win in the Russian SUV offroad simulator, but you have all chances to do it. Race your truck, fight with roads and the weather. Try our Russian SUV Offroad 3D, drive SUV and meet the offroad adventures!

Cool adventure is right here! Forget about convenient driving. Fight with Russian road and train how to survive. Just upgrade your offroad trucks and keep driving. Find the route in simulator even the weather is terrible and road is hard. You can't get such experience even if you have a real SUV. Try all Russian trucks from the garage and then write us about that.

It is time to try our Russian SUV Offroad 3D!
